# Takeaway

This page include some commonly used HTML tags and CSS rules that you will find helpful. 
:::

# HTML Tags

## Tags Used in `<body> </body>`

* First-level heading: `<h1>Chapter 1</h1>`  
* Second-level heading: `<h2>Section 1</h2>`  
* Start a paragraph: `<p>paragraph</p>`  
* <b>Bold text</b>: `<b>bold text</b>`  
* <i>Italic text</i>: `<i>italic text</i>`  
* Style a part of a <span style="color:#5a5ad0;font-size:larger;">text</span>: `<span style="color:#5a5ad0;font-size:larger;">text</span>`  
* Create a link to <a href = "https://www.google.com">Google</a>: `<a href="https://www.google.com">Google</a>`  
* Insert a <img src="https://www.w3schools.com/images/lamp.jpg" alt="Lamp" width="32" height="32">: `<img src="https://www.w3schools.com/images/lamp.jpg" alt="Lamp" width="32" height="32">`  
* Insert a line break (browers ignore line breaks in HTML code)[^nbsp]: `<br>`  

[^nbsp]: Browers also ignore _extra_ (more than 1) spaces in HTML code, you need to type `&nbsp;` to insert additional spaces.

## Tags Used in `<head> </head>`

* Set title of a docuemnt: `<title>A Meaningful Title</title>`  
* Include CSS style sheet `style.css`: `<link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">`  

# CSS Selector

| Selector        |    Meaning |
|:----------:|:----------:|
| `p {}` | all `<p>` elements | 
| `h1 {}` | all `<h1>` elements | 
| `.fancy {}` | elements of `class="fancy"`| 

# CSS Property and Value

* <span style="color: red">text color</span>: `color: red`   
* <span style="background-color: cyan">background color</span>: `background-color: cyan`   
* <span style="background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(2,0,36,1) 0%, rgba(0,212,255,1) 100%);color: white;">background gradient</span> [^1]: `background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(2,0,36,1) 0%, rgba(0,212,255,1) 100%);` 
* <span style="font-size: 1.5em">font size</span>: `font-size: 1.5em` 
* <span style="font-family: Courier">font family</span>: `font-family: Courier` 

[^1]: You can use <https://cssgradient.io> to help create a background gradient.
